Reviews.Title: “45 Giri club is making to much noise”
Reviews.Author: FTY
Reviews.Content: 45 Giri, a club, http://www.quarantacinquegiri.com (please check for yourself), located at the same address as Residence Libetta is causing too much noise and the crowd at night means you cant make your way back to your room! not recommended to stay here at all.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel apartment near Garbatella metro stop”
Reviews.Author: Jyotisath
Reviews.Content: Hotel apartment was spacious. There is noone at the reception making check in difficult - even middle of the day. There is a train line at the back of the hotel but it didnt disturb us too much. Having a kitchen in the apartment was very useful J

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: ivana2407
Reviews.Content: Apartment was grate. There is no staff only one man who does evrything, janitor, recepcionist,... Neighbourhood is not to nice, ther is too many local bars and discos wich did not look very friendly. Hotel is in the courtyard of some fameus club, and you have to show your keys to a bouncer on gate, so you could get in your appartment. Above our window ( we were in the basement) are railwaygauge, and metro runaways there , so you have a fealing it is in your room till 00.30h and from 4.30h again, but we did not mind that at all. Position is good, metro station is 5 min walking , so you are only 3 metro stations from Colloseum ( 3minutes ) , 5 metro stations from Spanish stairs, 7 stations from Vatican. Just arround the corner ther is a big market with very good prices. Onother thing I did not like, is that there is no cleaning. Appartment is very well equipped, you have kitchen elements, washer machine, ironing board, iron, dishes, TV-but no cable, frige,...... Basicly, we like it.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing good to say”
Reviews.Author: MsJonesEngland
Reviews.Content: Absolutely horrendous stay at Rentroof. It was a couple of years ago since me and my boyfriend stayed there, but it still gets my blood boiling. Not only the location right next to train tracks was hugely disturbing, but the customer service (or the lack of it!) demonstrated by the staff was appalling! We booked our stay way in advance through their own website. They had good prices and we were very pleased with our choice. Well, just before we left England to go on our holiday, I checked the prices again and they had gone way up! And conveniently of course they hadnt confirmed the price in the confirmation email. I of course brought this up straight away once we arrived, but there was no budging. On top of this we were treated like criminals as they wanted us to pay the stay in advance!! whereas in the confirmation email it said payment required after the stay. I would strongly NOT recommend this place to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare in Rome!!!”
Reviews.Author: KenBruges
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I arrived on a Friday night about 10:00pm, and feeling a little tired. We would have wanted to sleep but an horror movie started... behind the apartments there is the train track, which makes a terrible din. Moreover in front of the apartments there is a large nightclub... I was not aware that I would spend all night listening very loud music until 3:00am. The icing on the cake: the place was infested with drunks from the large nightclub yelling up and down the courtyard until after 4:00am. No staff to complain about that noise. Not serious. Not recommended.

Reviews.Title: “NOT if my life depended on it!!!!”
Reviews.Author: chinkydog
Reviews.Content: Do not book this apartment, unless you seriously want a misfortunate disapointment on your trip. Myself and friends prebooked and emailed details of our schedule prior to arrival to the receptionist. On arrival there was no sign of any apartment or any assistance what so ever. We were then stranded in a strange city -Rome , no accommodation at 1am. However, we had a very patient, but frustrated taxi driver, who kindly found us a hotel in the city centre. The hotel was four star and great value for money. Had a ball! Go........to Rome!!!!

Reviews.Title: “good stay at Rentroof”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 nights in the Rentroof open space apartment with our family. It was a pleasant stay. We were surprised by the modern furnishing. The apartment was new, clean and spacious. Beds were of good quality, kitchen was fully equipped, and towels were big and nice. We could get into our apartment directly on arrival (11:00 am). The walk to the metrostation Garbatella was approx. 10 minutes, bus stop (directly towards Vatican) was opposite to the apartment. Nevertheless this apartment is situated alongside the train track, which causes lots of nuissance with the windows open, but it is quite acceptable with the windows closed on that side.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay at Rentroof”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Do not stay at this 'hotel / apartment' We arrived in Rome at 9pm but did not arrive at the site until midnight due to following the hideous directions that were given to us. When we did arrive there were 2 shady characters booking us in. The apartment was dirty, smelly, and not what we had booked. The on-site cafe was still being built and the service non-existent. The receptionest was as useful as a chocolate teapot. They do not mention the train track 10 metres form the building. Also, it is a good 5 miles from the centre (not the 2 they advertise) and the local Metro station is a good mile (not 200 yards as advertised) When in Rome (the most fantastic city in the world) pay the extra and stay in a well known hotel The experience did not ruin our holiday and we will return to Rome again !

HotelInfo.Name: Residence Libetta
HotelInfo.Address: Via G Libetta 19, 00154 Rome, Italy
